summary: Adds a dialogue option for your follower which allows you to ask them to take off their clothes.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod, which adds a new line of dialogue for your follower \"Let\'s get naked!\"... 
What it does is:
Removes all items from your companion inventory, stores them into a safe hidden location, and so your companion will be completely naked. (or in undies, according to your body/textures mods of course).
While your follower is naked if you talk to him/her again you can ask them to get their clothes back on.

Works well with \"Followers can Relax\" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504 )

Note: 
It is not designed to work with any mod that makes you have multiple followers, although it should work anyway but it cannot handle the storage of multiple followers inventories.
author: voidtarget
